text: Cumia lucasi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Colubrariidae. ==Description== The shell size is 11 mm ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar. ==References== * Bozzetti, L., 2007. Fusus lucasi (Gastropoda: Hypsogastropoda: Colubrariidae) nuova specie dal Madagascar meridionale. Malacologia Mostra Mondiale 54: 11-12 Category:Colubrariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Cumia lucasi
